review_data.title: Buried within Enge Bahnoff (right next to the No1 Platform) > style & good manners
review_data.content: Known to many train travellers in Zurich & beyond (Zug is excellent , too) this reliable coffee-shop chain delivers good coffee, nice food & you can expect friendly service even when they're rushed...which at a rail station can easily be the case. My 'special' double...More
